mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_ORG_AUTH SET USER_ID=#{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ORG_ID=#{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, DIM_ID=#{dimId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ORG_PERMS=#{orgPerms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_PERMS=#{userPerms,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.ID,a.USER_ID,a.ORG_ID,a.DIM_ID, a.ORG_PERMS, a.USER_PERMS, b.fullname as USER_NAME,c.orgName FROM SYS_ORG_AUTH a left join sys_user b on a.user_id = b.userId left join sys_org c on a.org_id = c.orgId WHERE ID=#{id}

SELECT a.ID,a.USER_ID,a.ORG_ID,a.DIM_ID, a.ORG_PERMS, a.USER_PERMS, b.fullname as USER_NAME,ORGNAME FROM SYS_ORG_AUTH a left join sys_user b on a.user_id = b.userId left join sys_org c on a.org_id = c.orgId
order by ${orderField} ${orderSeq}

SELECT a.ID,a.USER_ID,a.ORG_ID,a.DIM_ID, a.ORG_PERMS, a.USER_PERMS, b.fullname as USER_NAME,ORGNAME,d.demName as dim_name,c.path as orgPath FROM SYS_ORG_AUTH a left join sys_user b on a.user_id = b.userId left join sys_org c on a.org_id = c.orgId left join sys_demension d on a.dim_Id = d.demId where a.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM SYS_ORG_AUTH WHERE user_id=#{userId} and DIM_ID=#{dimId}
SELECT * FROM SYS_ORG_AUTH WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} and ORG_ID=#{orgId}
